name: 陳錦文
objective: Technical textile is a textile product manufactured for non-aesthetic purposes, where the function is the primary criterion, including automotive applications, medical textiles, geotextiles, agrotextiles, and protective clothing, etc.
schedule:
Week 1 - Introduction to Technical Textiles
Week 2 - Textile Reinforced Composites - 1
Week 3 - Textile Reinforced Composites - 2
Week 4 - Textile Reinforced Composites - 3
Week 5 - Filter Fabrics
Week 6 - Geotextiles
Week 7 - Protective Textiles
Week 8 - Midterm exam
Week 9 - Medical Textile
Week 10 - Automotive Textiles - 1
Week 11 - Automotive Textiles - 2
Week 12 - 3D Textiles for Composites
Week 13 - Wearable Textiles
Week 14 - Nanofiber – Melt-brown Non-woven Textiles 
Week 15 - New Technical Textiles & Future Trends
Week 16 - Final exam
materials:
1. Provided PowerPoint files
2. Fibers for Technical Textiles (https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-030-49224-3 )
3. High-Performance and Specialty Fibers (https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-4-431-55203-1 )
4. Structure and Properties of High-Performance Fibers (https://www.elsevier.com/books/structure-and-properties-of-high-performance-fibers/bhat/978-0-08-100550-7 )
